title: Randos Takeover!
description:
Paul is on vacation. We wanted to share what other Bridges of Meaning Discord members are doing. 

Feel free to join the conversation here: https://discord.gg/TVNsWbm5

To view more Randos United videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEzWTLDYmL8soRdQec9Fsjw
